prefuse.util.ui
Class JPrefuseTree

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTree
                  prefuse.util.ui.JPrefuseTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class JPrefuseTree
extends javax.swing.JTree

Swing component that displays a prefuse Tree instance in a Swing JTree component. Graph instances can also be displayed by first getting a Tree instance with the Graph.getSpanningTree() method.

Author:
jeffrey heer
See Also:
JTree, Serialized Form
